text: Ensemble () is a liberal political coalition in France. It was formed in November 2021 as Ensemble Citoyens. It includes La RÃ©publique En Marche! (LREM), Democratic Movement (MoDem), Agir, Territories of Progress (TDP), Horizons, En commun, and the Progressive Federation. This coalition is seen as a supportive of President Emmanuel Macron. ==References== Category:Political parties in France Category:Liberal parties
title: Ensemble Citoyens
